text.value: Ask the patient how to record where they live
Enter a point on the map to represent where the patient lives
Please enter your health worker name
Please select the country you are in
Lived or worked in close contact with sick chickens
Enter additional details about the patient's address
Other (List here other symptoms described by patient or carer)
Enter additional details about the patient's address
Enter additional details about the patient's address
Lived or worked in close contact with goats
Waded, swum or bathed in pond water, lake water, or stream water
Lived or worked in close contact with cattle
Enter a description of where the patient's lives
2 = decerebrate (an abnormal posture that can include rigidity, arms and legs held straight out, toes pointed downward, head and neck arched backwards)

3 = decorticate posture (an abnormal posture that can include rigidity, clenched fists, legs held straight out, and arms bent inward toward the body with the wrists and fingers bend and held on the chest)
***(To the interviewer: Did the QR Code scan properly?)***
2 = Cries appropriately with pain, or, if verbal, speaks
1 = Moan or abnormal cry with pain

You have reached the end of the patient residence form. Please Ensure you have completed the following actions: 1) Ensure the CRF is marked as finalised 2) Save and exit the CRF

Thank you

Welcome to the Electronic FIEBRE patient address collection form.
This form is used to collect a recruited patient's residence to contact them at a later date.
Enter additional details about the patient's address
Use the tablet's camera to take a photo of the patient's QR code
The patient ID is missing, please go back and enter the patient ID
Please enter your health worker name
Please select the country that the facility is located in.

1) Complete the patient follow-up card with the follow-up date 28 days from now: 2) Ensure you have given the patient their follow-up appointment card. 3) Thank the patient for their time and participation in the research study.

Please remember to enter the lab results in the lab form, as soon as the results are available.

Thank you
Welcome to the Electronic FIEBRE patient data collection form
Use the tablet's camera to take a photo of the QR code in the top right hand corner of the signed sample collection consent form.
Patient has not consented end the interview

input.hint: This can be found on their consent form or on the patient labels

select1.hint: if no then manually type the patient ID

input.hint: enter in the format, 1234-123-12 and include the dashes (-)
GPS coordinates can only be collected when outside.
